timeline.bodyText: If this is going to be required for every camel-debezium extension, it'd be better to push it into a common debezium-support extension.
timeline.author: jamesnetherton

timeline.bodyText: Aside from the Connector and ConnectorTask classes, the other items can probably pushed into a common debezium-support extension
timeline.author: jamesnetherton

timeline.bodyText: Similar to previous comments. Apart from the connector, this seems likely to be required in all the debezium extensions so would be better located in a common place.
timeline.author: jamesnetherton

timeline.bodyText: Duplicated with debezium-postgres so belongs in a common extension.
timeline.author: jamesnetherton
